name: Sugoro Quest++: Dicenics
overview: Sugoro Quest++ Dicenics ("Sugoro" comes from sugoraku, a classic Japanese board game similar to Snakes and Ladders) is a video game that plays like a board game. It follows similar games like Dokapon 3-2-1 that combines RPG mechanics with a board game presentation. Sugoro Quest++ is the sequel/remake of Sugoro Quest for the Famicom and plays similarly. At the behest of the King, a group of dice warriors make their way around the Kingdom hunting monsters and trying to outdo each other. The combat in the game is entirely dictated by dice rolls. Up to four players can play.
